alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:54PM EST until December 20 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Hadley. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Major flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 PM EST Monday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Hadley Flood Stage: 14.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 pm: 16.4 Forecast: Tue 1 am 17.4 Tue 7 am 18.3 Tue 1 pm 17.7 Tue 7 pm 16.8 Wed 1 am 15.6 Wed 7 am 14.5 Wed 1 pm 13.5 Wed 7 pm 12.8 Thu 1 am 12.0 Thu 7 am 11.2 Thu 1 pm 10.5 Thu 7 pm 9.9 &&
